name: Battlemania IV
description: Complete 500 matches in any mode (excluding WOW) while using special characters.

rewards.title: Battle Veteran
rewards.extra: A badge showcasing your dedication to PUBG battles.

tipsTricks.heading: Focus on Shorter Modes
tipsTricks.description: Play shorter matches like Arcade or TDM to complete the requirement faster.

tipsTricks.heading: Stick with Special Characters
tipsTricks.description: Ensure you have selected and are using special characters like Andy, Carlo, or Sara for all matches.

tipsTricks.heading: Coordinate with Friends
tipsTricks.description: Team up with friends to make the matches more enjoyable and consistent.

tipsTricks.heading: Track Your Progress
tipsTricks.description: Keep an eye on your mission progress in the Missions tab to know how many matches are left.

requirements.heading: Complete 500 Matches with Special Characters
requirements.description: Play and finish a total of 500 matches in any mode except WOW while using special characters.

name: Battlemania III
description: Complete 100 matches in any mode (excluding WOW) while using special characters.

rewards.title: Battle Veteran
rewards.extra: A badge showcasing your dedication to PUBG battles.

tipsTricks.heading: Focus on Shorter Modes
tipsTricks.description: Play shorter matches like Arcade or TDM to complete the requirement faster.

tipsTricks.heading: Stick with Special Characters
tipsTricks.description: Ensure you have selected and are using special characters like Andy, Carlo, or Sara for all matches.

tipsTricks.heading: Coordinate with Friends
tipsTricks.description: Team up with friends to make the matches more enjoyable and consistent.

tipsTricks.heading: Track Your Progress
tipsTricks.description: Keep an eye on your mission progress in the Missions tab to know how many matches are left.

requirements.heading: Complete 100 Matches with Special Characters
requirements.description: Play and finish a total of 100 matches in any mode except WOW while using special characters.

name: Battlemania II
description: Complete 10 matches in any mode (excluding WOW) while using special characters.

rewards.title: Battle Veteran
rewards.extra: A badge showcasing your dedication to PUBG battles.

tipsTricks.heading: Focus on Shorter Modes
tipsTricks.description: Play shorter matches like Arcade or TDM to complete the requirement faster.

tipsTricks.heading: Stick with Special Characters
tipsTricks.description: Ensure you have selected and are using special characters like Andy, Carlo, or Sara for all matches.

requirements.heading: Complete 10 Matches with Special Characters
requirements.description: Play and finish a total of 10 matches in any mode except WOW while using special characters.

name: Battlemania I
description: Complete 5 matches in any mode (excluding WOW) while using special characters.

rewards.title: Battle Veteran
rewards.extra: A badge showcasing your dedication to PUBG battles.

tipsTricks.heading: Stick with Special Characters
tipsTricks.description: Ensure you have selected and are using special characters like Andy, Carlo, or Sara for all matches.

tipsTricks.heading: Track Your Progress
tipsTricks.description: Keep an eye on your mission progress in the Missions tab to know how many matches are left.

requirements.heading: Complete 5 Matches with Special Characters
requirements.description: Play and finish a total of 5 matches in any mode except WOW while using special characters.

name: Warhorse
description: Complete any 2 of the following weapon-specific mystery missions: SMG Mystery, Sniper Mystery, Shotgun Mystery, Melee Mystery, Assault Mystery, or Pistol Mystery.

rewards.title: Warhorse
rewards.extra: Achievement points and a prestigious in-game title.

tipsTricks.heading: Focus on One Mission at a Time
tipsTricks.description: Choose one weapon category per match to streamline progress towards completing its specific mystery.

tipsTricks.heading: Use the Right Map
tipsTricks.description: Select maps with the highest likelihood of finding the required weapons (e.g., Miramar for snipers, Sanhok for shotguns).

tipsTricks.heading: Engage in Close-Range Combat for Melee and Shotguns
tipsTricks.description: Land in areas with high player density to maximize melee and shotgun opportunities in close-range fights.

tipsTricks.heading: Play in Lower Tiers
tipsTricks.description: Playing in lower-ranked lobbies increases the chances of encountering bots, making it easier to complete weapon-specific challenges.

tipsTricks.heading: Track Your Progress
tipsTricks.description: Keep an eye on your mission progress after each match to determine which mysteries are close to completion.

requirements.heading: Complete SMG Mystery
requirements.description: Eliminate enemies using Sub-Machine Guns like UMP45, Vector, or Micro Uzi.

requirements.heading: Complete Sniper Mystery
requirements.description: Achieve kills using sniper rifles such as Kar98k, M24, or AWM.

requirements.heading: Complete Shotgun Mystery
requirements.description: Secure eliminations with shotguns like S686, S1897, or S12K.

requirements.heading: Complete Melee Mystery
requirements.description: Take down enemies with melee weapons such as Pan, Crowbar, or Sickle.

requirements.heading: Complete Assault Mystery
requirements.description: Finish enemies using assault rifles like M416, AKM, or SCAR-L.

requirements.heading: Complete Pistol Mystery
requirements.description: Eliminate enemies with pistols such as P1911, R1895, or Desert Eagle.

name: Envoy of War
description: Complete specific objectives in Arena Mode, including avenges, first eliminations, final blows, and legendary completions.

rewards.title: Arena Conqueror
rewards.extra: Exclusive badge showcasing your Arena Mode expertise

tipsTricks.heading: Focus on Teamplay for Avenges
tipsTricks.description: Stick close to teammates and quickly eliminate enemies who take down your allies to achieve avenges.

tipsTricks.heading: Play Aggressively for First Eliminations
tipsTricks.description: Push early in each round to secure the first kill. Use weapons with high damage per second like ARs or SMGs.

tipsTricks.heading: Plan for Final Blows
tipsTricks.description: Track enemy movements and save grenades or molotovs for the end of the round to secure the final kill.

tipsTricks.heading: Focus on High Damage for Legendary
tipsTricks.description: Deal consistent damage and assist teammates to achieve legendary status in rounds.

requirements.heading: Successfully Avenge 20 Times
requirements.description: Eliminate the enemy who took down your teammate 20 times in Arena Mode.

requirements.heading: Get 20 First Eliminations
requirements.description: Achieve the first kill of a round 20 times in Arena Mode.

requirements.heading: Get 20 Final Blows
requirements.description: Secure the last elimination of a round 20 times in Arena Mode.

requirements.heading: Complete Legendary 20 Times
requirements.description: Achieve legendary performance in Arena Mode 20 times by excelling in kills and assists.

name: Alpha & Omega
description: Achieve both the first elimination and the final blow in a single Arena Mode match.

rewards.title: Dual Finisher
rewards.extra: A unique badge showcasing your domination in Arena Mode

tipsTricks.heading: Push Aggressively for the First Elimination
tipsTricks.description: Move quickly at the start of the match and target exposed enemies to secure the first kill.

tipsTricks.heading: Save Resources for the Final Blow
tipsTricks.description: Keep a powerful weapon or utility, such as grenades, for the end of the match to secure the last kill.

tipsTricks.heading: Use Team Communication
tipsTricks.description: Coordinate with teammates to manage engagements effectively and set yourself up for both key eliminations.

requirements.heading: Get the First Elimination
requirements.description: Be the first player to eliminate an enemy in the match.

requirements.heading: Get the Final Blow
requirements.description: Secure the last elimination of the match to end the game.

name: Victory Legion IV
description: Complete 20 shoutouts in Arena Mode to showcase your standout performances.

rewards.title: Arena Champion
rewards.extra: A badge to display your achievements in Arena Mode.

tipsTricks.heading: What is a Shoutout?
tipsTricks.description: In PUBG's Arena Mode, a 'shoutout' refers to a special recognition given to players for extraordinary achievements, such as dealing the most damage, scoring the highest kills, or making clutch plays during a match.

tipsTricks.heading: Play Aggressively
tipsTricks.description: Engage in combat actively to maximize damage and secure kills, increasing your chances of earning a shoutout.

tipsTricks.heading: Focus on Performance
tipsTricks.description: Aim for consistent and standout actions, such as taking down multiple enemies quickly or being the MVP of your team.

tipsTricks.heading: Coordinate with Teammates
tipsTricks.description: Use teamwork to dominate rounds, as assisting in critical moments can also lead to recognition.

requirements.heading: Complete 20 Shoutouts
requirements.description: Participate in Arena Mode matches and achieve 20 shoutouts by performing exceptional actions in gameplay.

name: Victory Legion III
description: Complete 10 shoutouts in Arena Mode to prove your dominance.

rewards.title: Arena Star
rewards.extra: Earn recognition for participating in shoutouts in Arena Mode.

tipsTricks.heading: Understand Shoutouts
tipsTricks.description: A shoutout occurs when a player completes a standout performance in Arena. Strive for aggressive plays and consistency.

tipsTricks.heading: Focus on Team Play
tipsTricks.description: Coordinate with your team to maximize your chances of completing shoutouts.

tipsTricks.heading: Stay in the Fight
tipsTricks.description: Engage frequently to make your presence felt and have a higher chance of achieving shoutouts.

requirements.heading: Complete 10 Shoutouts
requirements.description: Participate in Arena matches and complete shoutouts during standout moments.

name: Victory Legion II
description: Complete 5 shoutouts in Arena Mode to prove your dominance.

rewards.title: Arena Star
rewards.extra: Earn recognition for participating in shoutouts in Arena Mode.

tipsTricks.heading: Understand Shoutouts
tipsTricks.description: A shoutout occurs when a player completes a standout performance in Arena. Strive for aggressive plays and consistency.

tipsTricks.heading: Focus on Team Play
tipsTricks.description: Coordinate with your team to maximize your chances of completing shoutouts.

tipsTricks.heading: Stay in the Fight
tipsTricks.description: Engage frequently to make your presence felt and have a higher chance of achieving shoutouts.

requirements.heading: Complete 5 Shoutouts
requirements.description: Participate in Arena matches and complete shoutouts during standout moments.

name: Victory Legion I
description: Complete 1 shoutouts in Arena Mode to prove your dominance.

rewards.title: Arena Star
rewards.extra: Earn recognition for participating in shoutouts in Arena Mode.

tipsTricks.heading: Understand Shoutouts
tipsTricks.description: A shoutout occurs when a player completes a standout performance in Arena. Strive for aggressive plays and consistency.

tipsTricks.heading: Focus on Team Play
tipsTricks.description: Coordinate with your team to maximize your chances of completing shoutouts.

requirements.heading: Complete 1 Shoutouts
requirements.description: Participate in Arena matches and complete shoutouts during standout moments.

name: Physical Trainer
description: Demonstrate your agility and stamina by completing these actions: crouch 10,000 times, jump 10,000 times, and go prone 100 times.

rewards.title: Master of Movement
rewards.extra: A badge that highlights your dedication to physical agility.

tipsTricks.heading: Crouch Efficiently
tipsTricks.description: Find a safe area in the Training Grounds or a non-combat zone during a match. Spam the crouch button repeatedly to quickly increase your crouch count.

tipsTricks.heading: Jump Strategically
tipsTricks.description: Use the jump action repeatedly in Training Grounds or while traversing the map during matches. Look for areas with minimal enemies to avoid interruptions.

tipsTricks.heading: Go Prone Safely
tipsTricks.description: While in a secure location, toggle the prone action multiple times. This can be done in open matches or the Training Grounds to complete the prone requirement.

tipsTricks.heading: Use Macros or Keybinds (Optional)
tipsTricks.description: If allowed in your setup, bind actions like crouch or jump to a single key for faster execution. Ensure this complies with PUBG's fair play policies.

tipsTricks.heading: Play Regular Matches
tipsTricks.description: Incorporate these actions naturally into gameplay by crouching during combat, jumping over obstacles, and going prone to hide from enemies.

requirements.heading: Crouch 10,000 Times
requirements.description: Perform the crouch action 10,000 times to meet this requirement.

requirements.heading: Jump 10,000 Times
requirements.description: Execute the jump action 10,000 times across matches.

requirements.heading: Go Prone 100 Times
requirements.description: Complete the prone action 100 times to fulfill this task.

name: Eye For An Eye
description: Eliminate an enemy who knocked you out earlier in the same match, proving your resilience and determination.

rewards.title: Vengeful Warrior
rewards.extra: A badge showcasing your ability to seek revenge.

tipsTricks.heading: Mark the Enemy
tipsTricks.description: After getting knocked out, take note of the player's name or location to track them later in the match.

tipsTricks.heading: Stay Near Teammates
tipsTricks.description: Allow your teammates to revive you quickly so you can stay in the fight and locate the enemy.

tipsTricks.heading: Use Tactical Strategies
tipsTricks.description: Approach the enemy carefully to avoid being knocked out again. Use cover and grenades to gain an advantage.

tipsTricks.heading: Replay Kill Feed
tipsTricks.description: Check the kill feed to identify and confirm the enemy who knocked you out.

requirements.heading: Eliminate the Enemy
requirements.description: Knock out and eliminate the same enemy who knocked you out in the same match.

name: Supreme Marksman
description: Showcase your shooting skills by completing three unique tasks: eliminate enemies with headshots without a scope, take down airborne targets, and eliminate enemies in the water.

rewards.title: Master Marksman
rewards.extra: A special badge demonstrating your precision and versatility in combat.

tipsTricks.heading: Headshots Without a Scope
tipsTricks.description: Use weapons with high accuracy and aim for the head at close range. Practicing hip-fire and iron sights can improve your accuracy.

tipsTricks.heading: Eliminating Airborne Enemies
tipsTricks.description: Target players using gliders, jumping frequently, or parachuting. Timing and leading your shots are key.

tipsTricks.heading: Eliminating Enemies in Water
tipsTricks.description: Engage enemies swimming or standing in shallow water. Use weapons with high damage per shot for quick eliminations.

tipsTricks.heading: Weapon Choice
tipsTricks.description: For all tasks, weapons like assault rifles (AKM, M416) or DMRs are versatile. Use grenades for enemies hiding in water.

tipsTricks.heading: Map Awareness
tipsTricks.description: Focus on areas with water bodies or open fields to find airborne or swimming enemies.

requirements.heading: Eliminate 10 Enemies with Headshots Without Scope
requirements.description: Take down 10 enemies by landing headshots without using any scopes.

requirements.heading: Eliminate 10 Airborne Enemies
requirements.description: Shoot down 10 enemies while they are airborne, such as while jumping or parachuting.

requirements.heading: Eliminate 10 Enemies in Water
requirements.description: Defeat 10 enemies swimming or standing in water bodies.

name: Perfect 10s
description: Master every weapon type by eliminating enemies using SMGs, pistols, LMGs, sniper rifles, ARs, shotguns, melee weapons, throwables, vehicles, and crossbows.

rewards.title: Weapon Master
rewards.extra: An exclusive badge showcasing your mastery with all weapon types.

tipsTricks.heading: Use the Right Maps
tipsTricks.description: Choose maps with diverse environments like Erangel and Miramar for vehicle kills and open fields for sniping.

tipsTricks.heading: Focus on One Weapon Type at a Time
tipsTricks.description: Prioritize one weapon category per match to complete the task systematically.

tipsTricks.heading: Close-Range Tactics
tipsTricks.description: For SMGs, shotguns, pistols, and melee weapons, engage in close-quarters combat in urban areas like Pochinki or School.

tipsTricks.heading: Vehicle Eliminations
tipsTricks.description: Knock enemies down first, then finish them off with a vehicle to count the elimination.

tipsTricks.heading: Throwable Eliminations
tipsTricks.description: Trap enemies in buildings or behind cover, and use grenades or molotovs for effective eliminations.

tipsTricks.heading: Sniping and Long-Range Combat
tipsTricks.description: Find a vantage point and use sniper rifles to eliminate enemies at long distances.

tipsTricks.heading: Crossbow Tips
tipsTricks.description: Engage stationary targets to improve accuracy with the crossbow and aim for headshots for instant eliminations.

requirements.heading: Eliminate 10 Enemies with SMG
requirements.description: Use SMGs like UMP45 or Vector in close-quarters combat for quick eliminations.

requirements.heading: Eliminate 10 Enemies with Pistol
requirements.description: Utilize pistols like the P1911 or Desert Eagle in early-game fights or confined spaces.

requirements.heading: Eliminate 10 Enemies with LMG
requirements.description: Deploy LMGs such as the M249 in suppressive fire scenarios to achieve eliminations.

requirements.heading: Eliminate 10 Enemies with Sniper Rifle
requirements.description: Pick sniper rifles like Kar98k or AWM to take down enemies at long distances.

requirements.heading: Eliminate 10 Enemies with AR
requirements.description: Use versatile ARs like M416 or AKM for mid-range combat.

requirements.heading: Eliminate 10 Enemies with Shotgun
requirements.description: Engage enemies at close range with powerful shotguns like S686 or S12K.

requirements.heading: Eliminate 10 Enemies with Melee Weapon
requirements.description: Sneak up on distracted or downed enemies to finish them with melee weapons like the pan.

requirements.heading: Eliminate 10 Enemies with Throwable
requirements.description: Utilize grenades, molotovs, or other throwables to eliminate enemies in confined spaces.

requirements.heading: Eliminate 10 Enemies with Vehicle
requirements.description: Knock down enemies and run them over with vehicles like the UAZ or buggy.

requirements.heading: Eliminate 10 Enemies with Crossbow
requirements.description: Engage stationary targets to maximize your chances of landing crossbow eliminations.

name: The Chosen One
description: Pick up the exclusive items found in air drops to complete this mission: Ghillie Suits, Groza, AWM, Mk14.

rewards.title: Air Drop Master
rewards.extra: A badge of honor showcasing your expertise in securing exclusive air-drop items.

tipsTricks.heading: Focus on Air Drop Locations
tipsTricks.description: Pay attention to the plane's path and look for air drops falling nearby. Air drops are marked with red or yellow smoke for easy identification.

tipsTricks.heading: Approach with Caution
tipsTricks.description: Air drops attract other players. Always scout the area before approaching and be prepared for combat.

tipsTricks.heading: Use Smoke Grenades for Cover
tipsTricks.description: Deploy smoke grenades near the air drop to obscure your position while looting it.

tipsTricks.heading: Stay Mobile
tipsTricks.description: Use a vehicle to reach air drops quickly and escape fast after looting.

tipsTricks.heading: Play in Squads
tipsTricks.description: Coordinate with teammates to secure air drops more effectively and protect each other during looting.

requirements.heading: Pick Up Ghillie Suit (Forest)
requirements.description: Find and pick up the Ghillie Suit (Forest) from an air drop. Available on maps with dense foliage such as Erangel, Sanhok, and Vikendi.

requirements.heading: Pick Up Ghillie Suit (Desert)
requirements.description: Pick up the Ghillie Suit (Desert) from an air drop. Available on Miramar.

requirements.heading: Pick Up Ghillie Suit (Dark Brown)
requirements.description: Secure the Ghillie Suit (Dark Brown) from an air drop. Available on Karakin.

requirements.heading: Pick Up Ghillie Suit (Snow)
requirements.description: Find the Ghillie Suit (Snow) in an air drop. Available exclusively on Vikendi.

requirements.heading: Pick Up Groza
requirements.description: Retrieve the powerful Groza assault rifle from an air drop for close-range dominance.

requirements.heading: Pick Up AWM
requirements.description: Loot the AWM sniper rifle from an air drop for its unmatched long-range power.

requirements.heading: Pick Up Mk14
requirements.description: Obtain the Mk14 from an air drop, which doubles as a sniper and an automatic weapon.

name: Suit Up
description: Equip all of the following items in a single match to complete the mission: Motorcycle Helmet (Lv. 1), Military Helmet (Lv. 2), Spetsnaz Helmets (Lv. 3), Police Vests, Military Vests, and Backpacks.

rewards.title: Gear Master
rewards.extra: A badge that showcases your thoroughness in equipping all levels of gear.

tipsTricks.heading: Loot Multiple Locations
tipsTricks.description: To equip all the items, you'll need to loot multiple locations. Be sure to visit both high-loot areas and regular loot zones like buildings and military bases.

tipsTricks.heading: Focus on Backpack and Vest Variety
tipsTricks.description: Backpacks and vests are available in different levels. Focus on gathering Level 1, Level 2, and Level 3 versions by searching the appropriate zones.

tipsTricks.heading: Visit Police Stations and Military Bases
tipsTricks.description: Police Vests and Military Helmets are commonly found in police stations and military bases, so make sure to check these locations first.

tipsTricks.heading: Use the Motorcycle Helmet as a Backup
tipsTricks.description: Motorcycle Helmets are common and are easy to find, so make sure to keep a Level 1 version for the mission while you focus on higher-tier items.

requirements.heading: Equip Motorcycle Helmet (Lv. 1)
requirements.description: Equip a Level 1 Motorcycle Helmet in your inventory. These are commonly found early in the match and in standard loot zones.

requirements.heading: Equip Military Helmet (Lv. 2)
requirements.description: Find and equip a Level 2 Military Helmet, which offers better protection. Look for it in military bases, police stations, and large buildings.

requirements.heading: Equip Spetsnaz Helmets (Lv. 3)
requirements.description: Equip a Spetsnaz Helmet (Lv. 3). This helmet can be found in higher-tier loot zones, such as air drops or military base locations.

requirements.heading: Equip Police Vest (Lv. 1)
requirements.description: Pick up a Police Vest (Lv. 1) for early match protection. These can be found easily in houses and small buildings.

requirements.heading: Equip Police Vest (Lv. 2)
requirements.description: Locate a Level 2 Police Vest, which provides better protection than the Level 1 vest. Search in military areas and police stations.

requirements.heading: Equip Military Vest (Lv. 3)
requirements.description: Equip a Level 3 Military Vest, which offers the highest protection. These vests can be found in military loot zones or air drops.

requirements.heading: Equip Backpack (Lv. 1)
requirements.description: Find and equip a Level 1 Backpack. These are commonly found in most areas and are needed to start collecting more gear.

requirements.heading: Equip Backpack (Lv. 2)
requirements.description: Search for a Level 2 Backpack, which increases your carrying capacity. These are commonly found in houses and warehouses.

requirements.heading: Equip Backpack (Lv. 3)
requirements.description: Find a Level 3 Backpack, which provides the maximum carrying capacity. Look for these in larger buildings, military zones, or as part of air drops.

name: Life of Fragile
description: Die in the following ways to complete the mission: Eliminated by a bullet, eliminated outside of the safe zone, drowned, fell to death, eliminated in melee range, eliminated by a throwable, eliminated by a bomb in the red zone, eliminated by a vehicle.

rewards.title: Fragile Survivor
rewards.extra: A badge recognizing your survival in the most precarious situations.

tipsTricks.heading: Die by Bullet
tipsTricks.description: To be eliminated by a bullet, simply engage in combat with enemies and let them eliminate you. Avoid healing or running away to let the enemy finish you off.

tipsTricks.heading: Eliminate Outside the Safe Zone
tipsTricks.description: Stay outside the safe zone until the blue zone completely kills you. It’s best to intentionally stay behind when the safe zone shrinks and die from the zone's damage.

tipsTricks.heading: Drowned
tipsTricks.description: To drown, swim into the water and stay underwater until you die. You can do this in any water body within the map.

tipsTricks.heading: Fell to Death
tipsTricks.description: Climb to a high location, such as a tall building or mountain, and jump off to die from falling damage. You can also attempt to fall from a vehicle for quicker results.

tipsTricks.heading: Eliminated in Melee Range
tipsTricks.description: Get close to an enemy and allow them to eliminate you with a melee weapon, such as a pan or crowbar.

tipsTricks.heading: Eliminated by Throwable
tipsTricks.description: Allow an enemy to throw a grenade, molotov, or flashbang and eliminate you with one of these throwables.

tipsTricks.heading: Eliminated by Bomb in Red Zone
tipsTricks.description: Stay inside a red zone during a bombing run and allow yourself to get hit by the bombs to die. Avoid moving out of the red zone intentionally.

tipsTricks.heading: Eliminated by Vehicle
tipsTricks.description: Get run over by a vehicle, either intentionally or by letting an enemy drive into you. Stay in the path of a moving vehicle for this.

requirements.heading: Eliminated by a Bullet
requirements.description: Allow an enemy to eliminate you with a firearm.

requirements.heading: Eliminated Outside of Safe Zone
requirements.description: Die from the blue zone by staying outside the safe zone.

requirements.heading: Drowned
requirements.description: Swim in water until you drown. Ensure you don’t resurface before your health runs out.

requirements.heading: Fell to Death
requirements.description: Jump from a high place and die from falling damage.

requirements.heading: Eliminated in Melee Range
requirements.description: Allow an enemy to eliminate you in close combat using a melee weapon.

requirements.heading: Eliminated by Throwable
requirements.description: Allow an enemy to eliminate you with a throwable item, such as a grenade or molotov.

requirements.heading: Eliminated by Bomb in Red Zone
requirements.description: Die from a bomb in the red zone. Remain within the red zone until you are eliminated.

requirements.heading: Eliminated by Vehicle
requirements.description: Allow yourself to be run over by a vehicle to complete this requirement.

name: T-800
description: Achieve Terminator rank one time in Arena Mode by eliminating more enemies than any other player on your team.

rewards.title: Terminator
rewards.extra: Exclusive Terminator badge and bragging rights

tipsTricks.heading: Outperform Your Teammates
tipsTricks.description: Focus on securing as many kills as possible while ensuring your survival. Eliminate more players than your teammates to earn the Terminator rank.

tipsTricks.heading: Stay Aggressive and Smart
tipsTricks.description: Play aggressively but intelligently. Take calculated risks to eliminate enemies while ensuring you have the best positioning for engagements.

requirements.heading: Eliminate More Enemies than Your Teammates
requirements.description: Achieve Terminator rank by having the most eliminations compared to your teammates in Arena Mode.

requirements.heading: Survive and Rank High
requirements.description: Not only must you eliminate the most enemies, but you should also survive until the later stages of the match to secure the Terminator rank.

name: Take Me With You
description: Board an enemy vehicle and stay on it for more than 10 seconds.

rewards.title: Freeloader
rewards.extra: Earn the title and a special badge for your daring ride.

tipsTricks.heading: Spot an Enemy Vehicle
tipsTricks.description: Look for enemy vehicles on the map. These can be land vehicles like cars, bikes, or boats.

tipsTricks.heading: Board the Vehicle Stealthily
tipsTricks.description: Wait for an enemy vehicle to pass by, and then quickly hop onto the moving vehicle. You must be close enough when the vehicle slows down or stops.

tipsTricks.heading: Survive the 10 Seconds
tipsTricks.description: Once on the vehicle, stay on it for at least 10 seconds without being knocked off. Be cautious of the driver trying to shake you off or getting shot at.

requirements.heading: Board an Enemy Vehicle
requirements.description: Find and get on an enemy vehicle for more than 10 seconds to complete the mission.

name: Run Chicken Run
description: Complete the following tasks: walk 10000 meters, travel in a vehicle for 10000 meters, and swim for 5000 meters.

rewards.title: Marathon Runner
rewards.extra: Earn the title and a special badge for your extensive travel.

tipsTricks.heading: Maximize Walking Distance
tipsTricks.description: Walk around in the safe zone while looting or exploring to cover a significant amount of distance. Try to avoid unnecessary combat to maximize your walking distance.

tipsTricks.heading: Vehicle Travel
tipsTricks.description: Use vehicles to quickly cover large distances. You can either find a car, bike, or boat, depending on the map. Stay in the vehicle for extended periods to reach the 10000-meter goal.

tipsTricks.heading: Swim Across Water
tipsTricks.description: When you come across bodies of water, swim to cover the required distance. Swimming across lakes, rivers, and the coastline will help you complete this part of the mission.

requirements.heading: Walk for 10000 Meters
requirements.description: You need to walk a total of 10000 meters during the match. Walking while looting or exploring is an efficient way to complete this task.

requirements.heading: Travel in a Vehicle for 10000 Meters
requirements.description: Use a vehicle (car, bike, boat) and travel a total of 10000 meters. Vehicles are the fastest way to complete this requirement.

requirements.heading: Swim for 5000 Meters
requirements.description: Swim through bodies of water to reach the 5000 meters required. Take advantage of lakes, rivers, and oceans during the match.

name: Fire At Will
description: Equip the following weapons in a match: MI6A4, AKM, SCAR-L, M416, Win94, Kar98K, VSS, Mini14, SLR, SKS, UZI, UMP45, Vector, Thompson, SMG, S686, S1897, SI2K, DP-28, P92, P1911, R1895, P18C, R45, Crossbow, pan, sawed-off.

rewards.title: Weapon Master
rewards.extra: Earn the title 'Weapon Master' for equipping all the listed weapons.

tipsTricks.heading: Maximize Weapon Collection
tipsTricks.description: Make sure to loot all the specified weapons during your match. Visit various locations to ensure you can pick up the diverse range of weapons required.

tipsTricks.heading: Prioritize Weapon Variety
tipsTricks.description: Focus on getting a variety of weapon types, including rifles, shotguns, pistols, and SMGs, to meet the mission requirements.

tipsTricks.heading: Use Weapons Effectively
tipsTricks.description: While collecting all the listed weapons, use them effectively during the match to increase your chances of survival and complete the mission.

requirements.heading: Equip All Weapons
requirements.description: Loot and equip the listed weapons during the match. Ensure that you have at least one of each weapon type in your inventory.

name: Star Support
description: Pick up the following items in a single match: Stun Grenade, Smoke Grenade, Molotov Cocktail, Frag Grenade, Fuel Battery Pack, Energy Drink, Adrenaline Syringe, First Aid Kit, Painkillers, Bandage, and Med Kit.

rewards.title: Support Specialist
rewards.extra: Earn the title 'Support Specialist' for collecting all listed healing and utility items.

tipsTricks.heading: Loot High-Traffic Areas
tipsTricks.description: Loot popular areas like military bases, large towns, and supply drops where you can find a good variety of utility items like grenades and healing supplies.

tipsTricks.heading: Prioritize Utility Items
tipsTricks.description: When looting, focus on collecting utility items first such as grenades and healing items to progress in the mission.

tipsTricks.heading: Check Drops and Airdrops
tipsTricks.description: Air drops often contain high-quality healing items and utility supplies such as Med Kits, Adrenaline Syringes, and Frag Grenades. Keep an eye on drop locations.

requirements.heading: Pick Up All Listed Items
requirements.description: You need to collect all the following items during a match: Stun Grenade, Smoke Grenade, Molotov Cocktail, Frag Grenade, Fuel Battery Pack, Energy Drink, Adrenaline Syringe, First Aid Kit, Painkillers, Bandage, and Med Kit.

name: Armour Expert
description: Pick up the following weapon attachments during a single match: Muzzle, Stock, Magazine, Foregrip, and Scope.

rewards.title: Tactical Specialist
rewards.extra: Earn the title 'Tactical Specialist' for collecting all weapon attachments listed in one match.

tipsTricks.heading: Loot High-Density Areas
tipsTricks.description: Focus on looting areas with high weapon spawn rates such as military bases, towns, and large settlements where weapon attachments are more likely to be found.

tipsTricks.heading: Check Weapon Attachments in Buildings
tipsTricks.description: Weapon attachments like Muzzles, Stocks, and Scopes can often be found inside buildings and weapon crates. Always inspect the loot in weapon supply areas.

tipsTricks.heading: Loot Every Weapon You Find
tipsTricks.description: Whenever you find a weapon, pick it up and inspect its attachments. You may find Muzzles, Stocks, or Foregrips that you need for the mission.

requirements.heading: Pick Up Weapon Attachments
requirements.description: Pick up the following attachments during a single match: Muzzle, Stock, Magazine, Foregrip, and Scope. These attachments are typically found in supply crates or high-loot zones.
